long_description: Lightweight and lumbar-hugging, the Osprey Talon 4 Waistpack is perfect for carrying water and a few essentials for hiking, biking and trail running. 2 zippered hipbelt pockets and main compartment with internal mesh pocket stow gear. 2 padded sleeves securely hold included BPA-free water bottles. Osprey Talon 4 Waistpack features Straight Jacket(TM) horizontal compression straps and side stabilizers that secure water bottles for jostle-free carrying. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and lumbar-hugging, the Osprey Talon 4 Waistpack is perfect for carrying water and a few essentials for hiking, biking and trail running.
